Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using patient-derived fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot analysis showed a reduced level of Parkin protein in fibroblasts carrying the c.1298A>G variant compared to control fibroblasts (approximately 60% reduction).

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Three technical replicates were run for each sample.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cDNA was introduced as a positive control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression level comparable to control fibroblasts. (Inferred)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression level significantly below control fibroblasts (60% reduction indicated).
